quest.name: In Search of Iceheart
journal: Alphinaud would see to one final matter before setting forth.
Though eager to depart, Alphinaud thinks it prudent to relay the details of the impending journey to Tataru. Return to Fortemps Manor, and speak with the waiting receptionist.

Having listened to the particulars of your mission, Tataru wishes you well, and promises to continue her search for the missing Scions in your absence. By way of a parting gift, she then presents Alphinaud with clothing more suited to the harsh conditions of the Coerthan wilderness. Your farewells now said, seek out Estinien at Saint Reinette's Forum, and inform him that you are ready to leave.

Alphinaud proposes that you begin the search for Lady Iceheart in the last place you encountered her─the Coerthas western highlands. Travel to Falcon's Nest, and speak with Ser Redwald for the latest reports on heretical activity in the area.

In response to Alphinaud's request for information, Ser Redwald suggests that you consult his knights─both a group soon to return from patrol, and an expedition sent to pick over the remnants of the heretic hideaway you discovered at Gorgagne Mills. While Estinien awaits the return of the patrol, head to the Gorgagne Holding with Alphinaud and question the leader of the knights assigned to search the farmhouse.

The expedition leader claims to have discovered a promising sheaf of letters in the farmhouse. Alas, these were not the only things the heretics left behind... Apparently, their “pets” fell upon the knights unexpectedly, wounding several, and preventing further investigation. Slay the beasts so that whatever remains of the heretics' missives can be retrieved.
You have slain the tamed polar bears lurking within the farmhouse. Inform the expedition leader that it is safe for his men to continue their investigation.
The expedition leader is relieved to hear that he and his men may return to their duties without fear of further maulings. All that remains is to claim the letters left behind by the heretics...
objectives: Speak with Redwald at Falcon's Nest.
Slay the beasts within Gorgagne Mills.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Before we set forth, we must needs inform Tataru of our plans.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Then I shall await you at Saint Reinette's Forum. Tell your friend we may be some time─the road you have chosen is neither short nor easy.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of that I need no reminding. Come, Forename. Let us head back to Fortemps Manor.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I will say this for your plan: it has made keeping secrets from the Holy See seem almost entertaining.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: I told the count that the Scions are here to stay!

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Have you spoken with your friend? ...Well, see that she is prepared for a long wait. She will burn many a candle at her window ere we set foot in Ishgard again.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Our course is set, Tataru. It may be some time before Forename and I return to Ishgard.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Well, just you be careful, all right? Oh, and don't worry about me─I'll be busy listening out for news of our lost friends!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If anyone can find them, it is you, Tataru. Farewell, for now...

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Oh! Oh! Before you go! You must put this on, Alphinaud! I made it specially!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: No, no, I...I couldn't possibly... <sigh> Very well.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: By the Twelve... It fits perfectly. And the quality is...actually rather good.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: I'm glad you like it! I've been practicing my needlework while I listen to rumors and the like. A good receptionist is always learning new skills!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: My thanks, Tataru. Whatever else awaits me upon the road, I shall not fear the cold.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: 'Twas the least I could do. Now, I must be getting back to the tavern, or I'll never catch up with all the gossip! Best of luck on your journey!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This new attire will serve me well in the bitter cold of Coerthas. I shall have to thank Tataru properly upon our return.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: You have said your farewells, then?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Aye, we are ready to depart. I suggest we begin our search for Lady Iceheart without delay.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Very well, but she will prove an elusive quarry. Where do you intend to start looking?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In the absence of any fresh intelligence on Ysayle's movements, I propose we pick up the trail where she was encountered last─the Coerthas western highlands.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let us speak with...Ser Redwald, was it? As the commander of Falcon's Nest, it is like that he will know if any heretic activity has been reported in the area.

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: Well, well! MistressMaster Surname! What business brings you back to Falcon's Nest?

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: ...Judging by the company you keep, it can be no trifling matter. The Azure Dragoon I know, of course, but I do not believe I have met this young gentleman...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alphinaud Leveilleur, at your service. And you are not mistaken as to the gravity of our mission, Ser Redwald. As I am sure you are aware, the Observatorium has warned that the Dravanians gather for another assault.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We believe there may yet be a way to avert the coming conflict─but only if we can find the elusive Lady Iceheart. Thus have we come to Falcon's Nest in the hope of acquiring the latest intelligence on the heretics' movements.

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: I see. Then you would be best served by speaking directly to my men. A patrol is due to return from its sweep of the surrounding lands at any moment.

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: You may also wish to question the knights assigned to pick over the remains of the heretic refuge at Gorgagne Mills. 'Tis possible they have unearthed information that could be of use to you. MistressMaster Surname knows well the place I speak of, for it was shehe who first discovered it.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Let us divide our forces, then. I will stay and await the return of the patrol while the two of you visit this refuge. When I have completed my inquiries, I will join you there.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: A wise use of our time.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Come, Forename. I am eager to learn what Ser Redwald's men have found in the heretics' lair.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: As agreed, I will stay and await the return of the patrol while the two of you visit the heretics' refuge. When I have completed my inquiries, I will join you there.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Just a simple farmhouse... It makes one wonder what other innocent facades the heretics have chosen to hide behind.

dialogue.name: KIGHTLEADER01604
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Surname! ...Our findings, you say? Well, there is something of a tale there...

dialogue.name: KIGHTLEADER01604
dialogue.text: No sooner had we chanced upon a promising-looking sheaf of letters than we were ambushed from the shadows by great white beasts.

dialogue.name: KIGHTLEADER01604
dialogue.text: 'Twould seem the heretics foresaw our coming, and left behind their pets to discourage further investigation. Several of our number were badly wounded...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...And you cannot carry out your duties until the creatures are slain. We have not the time to wait for reinforcements─let us deal with these “pets” ourselves, Forename.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Oh... Oh dear... Th-The creature took me by surprise... F-Forgive me... Until my hands stop shaking, I fear I shall prove more a hindrance than a h-help. Pray go on ahead, and when you are certain that the rest of these...things have been slain, notify the expedition leader that it is safe to return.

dialogue.name: KIGHTLEADER01604
dialogue.text: We were ill prepared for what awaited us at the farmhouse... Forgive me, but until the creatures have been put down, we cannot safely continue our investigation.

dialogue.name: KIGHTLEADER01604
dialogue.text: The beasts are slain, then? My thanks, MistressMaster Surname... We may return to our duty without fear of a mauling.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: My inquiries availed me naught. The patrol leader had little to say beyond which of his extremities the frost had bitten the hardest...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I heard a frightful growling from below. You encountered more of the beasts, I take it?
